entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 12:32 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the morning then clearing. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:32 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
